message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $22,000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider a price up to $8,000 for this product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $8,000 is significantly below its true value.  To move this forward, I'm willing to come down to $19,000. I believe this is a fair offer considering the value this product brings.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. However, I still believe that $8,000 would be a fair price for this product based on my assessment of its value. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
